titles.title: Purge me, O Lord, until my heart is clean,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Purge me, O Lord, until my heart is clean,
Test me and try me till nothing stands between;
Lead me through the fire that brings me unto Thee,
Until I stand before Thee, a perfect, fruitful tree.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Search me, O Lord, and try my heart today,
Try me, O Saviour, and know my thoughts I pray;
See if there be some wicked way in me,
Cleanse me from every sin, and set me free.
